author: Simon Difford
description: Naturally, this also works well with well-aged rums, but I prefer the cleaner bite of a rum with a mere three years or so age in this delicious cocktail.
name: Espresso Rumtini
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
